descriptionHtml:
This Mod Adds's 8 weapons all in different Locations Across Skyrim The First on is in aIftand you have Question's Please

Put It In The Comment's Below
(this is a work in progress)




The First weapon is called Suviien it is located in aIftand It Is being used by a female Dremora

The Second Weapon called Gorak is at Labrinthian It is being used by a breton vampire

The 3rd weapon called Borak is at bards leap

The 4th weapon called Wuviik Is in dawnstar and is being carried by a Frendly npc named Felda

The 5 weapon is at ysgromor's Tomb It is called juviik

Also see on steam

i wont be updating a lot because of issues with time... but i will whenever i can
author: angeloma000
